name: Burnouts
description:
What's the difference between a mindless sack of flesh constantly on the lookout for sustenance and a pothead? Probably better off asking about the similarities...

Take control of Levi and his group of societal burnouts who are on a mission to find a source of income by moving a large quantity of drugs outside of town and gouge the prices. Problems may arise when some of them begin to catch on to a sinister plot unfolding right under their noses. Discover that not everything is what it appears to be at first glance in this Pop Reference, Dimly Comical and Story-Driven tale about friends, enemies, relationships and betrayal.

  • No Turn-Based Combat

  • Mobility driven by a combination of Stealth, Quick Reaction Time Events and Puzzles

  • Linear-Adventure driven maps

  • Any moment in Gameplay can quickly descend into a life or death situation

  • Immersive soundtrack and sound effects

  • Dozens of Pop Culture References that will have you smiling while being brutally eaten by a zombie
